channel.title: [562] Help on Npc talk

item.title: [562] Help on Npc talk
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

Ok, so i need help with the npc talking to you, and you talking back to them.

this is the code for someone with the skillcape shop…

if(npc.getId() == 2270) { p.turnTemporarilyTo(npc); npc.turnTemporarilyTo(p); skillCapeHandler.initiateSpeech(p, 2270, 200, "Martin Thwait", "Soo, I hear you might be sneaky?"); }

i want to write that but with the npc id being 599 and having talking to that npc you come up with these options…

Npc:You want me to fix your uglyness?

You: I’m not That ugly!..Sure
or
You:No! Go Away!

I have Some clue on how to write it but i still need some help.

Read full topic
